name: Seek The Light - Prototype
description:
You have arrived in the Forest. This is the place. Seek the light.

WASD / Arrow Keys to move

LMB to attack

This was made for a small course in Construct 3. The game has a whole lot of problems and lacks some features due to the limited experience of the program. I may continue polishing this game further and add new content someday in the future. Do leave a comment if you enjoyed it, as shallow as it may be for now.

Music by Greg Davis on www.freemusicarchive.org
